basics.name: Jhon Anderson Briones Coto
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full-stack web developer with expertise in Svelte, SvelteKit, Astro, React and Next.js. Proficient in both relational and non-relational databases, I am passionate about crafting high-quality web applications and exploring the ever-evolving landscape of web development. A highly motivated and results-driven professional, I thrive on learning new technologies, solving complex challenges, and contributing to innovative projects. As a collaborative team player, I am always eager to support others and foster a positive development environment.

work.name: El sabor de mi cocina
work.summary: As co-founder of a restaurant specialising in traditional Honduran cuisine, I focused on the digital side of operations. I managed the design and implementation of marketing strategies, including promotional materials and campaigns. Additionally, I oversaw the configuration and maintenance of the POS system to ensure smooth transactions. Beyond the digital realm, I handled procurement for ingredients and operated the till, consistently delivering exceptional service to our valued customers.
